title: Yorick is HEERE

embed.description: Yorick can have up to four Mist Walkers in his service at once. Mist Walkers decay if they move too far from either Yorick or the Maiden of the Mist. A grave is occasionally created when enemy minions or neutral monsters die near Yorick, and all enemy champions that die near him leave a grave.

body: In General I think he's gonna be amazing, he'll need more skill but as expected from Riot tbh, a very indeed impressive and amazing update for Yorick.

replies.body:
OMFG DUDE IM GONNA BE SO PROUD TO WEAR THIS

http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z459/Tom_Smoodger/yozzamozza_zpsiin8py6y.jpg

Zed
Yasuo
Riven

Vayne

Espeically if they are as off meta as Urgot and Yorick :P

congrats!

Yea haha, I've got lvl 7 Azir, Aurelion Sol and Taliyah.

But Azir has since become popular...

Lol

Im gonna be like

'I played yorick before he was cool'

As a long time Yorick fan I'm happy to finally see him getting this long awaited rework.

Gonna need to get my level 5 before next patch.
Im so glad he is getting some love! and he looks so cool now!
His kit confused me,I need to see some gameplay but in general im glad they finally reworked him <3
